DESCRIPTION__C:
J. Walter Company founded
by Walter J. Somers in
Pointe-Claire (Quebec) Canada.
NAME: CH 1 - 1952
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 01

DESCRIPTION__C:
First 4 1/2" vertical grinder
introduced by J. Walter
Company.
NAME: CH 1 - 1956
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 01

DESCRIPTION__C:
Introduction of the First
Jigsaw power tool
NAME: CH 1 - 1957
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 01

DESCRIPTION__C:
Introduction of Walter Machinery (1959-1984).
Introduction of High Performance Power Tools and the first cold saw
(metal cutting circular saw).
NAME: CH 1 - 1959
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 01

DESCRIPTION__C: Launch of the Saw Blade Sharpening Service.
NAME: CH 2 - 1960
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 02

DESCRIPTION__C:
First 7" Angle Grinder
introduced to the market.
NAME: CH 2 - 1962
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 02

DESCRIPTION__C:
First 4 1/2" angle grinder
"MINI-GRINDER".
NAME: CH 2 - 1967
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 02

DESCRIPTION__C:
Introduction of the first flexible grinding wheels followed
by other unique high performance abrasives.
NAME: CH 3 - 1973
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 03

DESCRIPTION__C:
Introduction to Walter's market leading ZIPCUT/ ZIPWHEEL
high performance cutting wheel.
NAME: CH 4 - 1986
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 04

DESCRIPTION__C:
Introduction of Walter’s popular Safety Seminars. Since its inception,
it has reached over 55,000 metal fabrication personnel in Canada.
NAME: CH 4 - 1987
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 04

DESCRIPTION__C:
Mr. Pierre Somers was appointed President
of the company in 1989.
NAME: CH 4 - 1989
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 04

DESCRIPTION__C:
Start-up of U.S. operations,
with a base office in Windsor, Connecticut.
NAME: CH 5 - 1990
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 05

DESCRIPTION__C:
Start-up of Brazilian operations in São Paulo
and the launch of the ENDURO-FLEX flap disc.
NAME: CH 5 - 1996
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 05

DESCRIPTION__C:
Establishment of German operations through joint venture
with CB-Chemie und Biotechnologie.

ISO 9001 certification of Canadian operations.
ISO 14 001 certification of German operations.
NAME: CH 5 - 1999
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 05

DESCRIPTION__C:
Start-up of operations in Mexico.
Acquisition and conversion of Swiss operations.
Launch of Surfox, a safer and faster alternative for weld cleaning.
NAME: CH 6 - 2000
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 06

DESCRIPTION__C:
Launch of Bio-Circle Parts
washing system using
bio-remediation.
NAME: CH 6 - 2001
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 06

DESCRIPTION__C: ONCAP, the middle-market private equity platform of Onex Corporation, acquires a majority stake in Walter Surface Technologies in partnership with the existing management team.
NAME: CH 7 - 2018
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA

DESCRIPTION__C:
Celebration of 50th Anniversary

Walter J. Somers Chair at the
HEC Business School.

Bio-Circle certified by Environment.
Canada's Environmental Choice Program. -
Eco-Logo.
NAME: CH 6 - 2002
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 06

DESCRIPTION__C: Technology Innovation Award by the Wall Street Journal.
NAME: CH 6 - 2006
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 06

DESCRIPTION__C:
ISO 14 001 certification
of Brazilian operations.

Bio-Circle L approved for the
NSF Non-food Compounds
Registration Program & EPA
approval process started.
NAME: CH 6 - 2008
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 06

DESCRIPTION__C:
Launch of LEED® (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design Green Building
Rating System) building project for New International Headquarters in Pointe-Claire,
Quebec Canada.
NAME: CH 6 - 2009
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 06

DESCRIPTION__C:
Building officially completed and certified LEED GOLD, in recognition of performance
in five key areas of human & environmental health: sustainable site development,
water efficiency, energy efficiency, materials selection, indoor environmental quality.
NAME: CH 7 - 2012
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 07

DESCRIPTION__C:
Launch of ZIP-ONE, the thinnest cutting wheel on the market.
Launch of family of Nature Boost products (GS 200, CB 100 and Bio-Circle L Ultra).
Launch of the Clean-Box concept.
NAME: CH 7 - 2013
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 07

DESCRIPTION__C: Walter inaugurates new state-of-the-art sustainable manufacturing facility for the Bio-Circle product line.
NAME: CH 7 - 2013
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 07

DESCRIPTION__C: ZIPCUTTER is launched as Walter's first cordless grinder. It's power and long battery life raise the bar in portable grinding operations.
NAME: CH 7 - 2015
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 07

DESCRIPTION__C: Walter eliminates the need for hazardous weld cleaning operations with the introduction of SURFOX - a family of highly engineered electrochemical weld cleaning and marking systems.
NAME: CH 7 - 2017
STORE__R.NAME: Walter-EN_CA
WALTERB2BSTORE_HISTORY_CHAPTER__R.NAME: Chapter 07
